lines.text: Fate has made a beautiful mistake and we are together when we might have been apart.
You have the intention of staying long in France, Mr. Barratt?
I don't know. That is to say that I didn't know there was any restriction apart from the question of money.
It seems simpler to let ourselves to be taken as twins than to explain what we ourselves do not understand.
You couldn't perhaps be the devil?
I didn't think you could be but I thought I better make sure
Afraid not. No it's nothing as simple as that.
